fields.description:
SELECT userid , gamename , SUM(times) AS sumtimes
FROM user_fenci_sumcount A 
RIGHT JOIN need_recommende_game B
ON (TRUE) 
WHERE LOCATE(A.fenci,B.gamename) 
GROUP BY userid , gamename
ORDER BY A.userid , sumtimes DESC


Error: java.lang.RuntimeException: Hive Runtime Error while closing operators: java.lang.Integer cannot be cast to java.lang.Boolean

How can I solve it ?
fields.summary: Error: java.lang.RuntimeException: Hive Runtime Error while closing operators: java.lang.Integer cannot be cast to java.lang.Boolean

comments.body: [~CLJ0918] can you check that, instead:{{LOCATE(A.fenci,B.gamename)}} , try using {{LOCATE(A.fenci,B.gamename) > 0}}
Thank you very much！I solved the problem！
